item.description:
A limited attendance event. Only six slots available.

This paddle trip will go from a put in in Merrimack, NH near "The Common Man" and we run downstream in the Merrimack River all the way to the boathouse in Lowell. MA!

I hope to do more of these trips as we can, this is one opportunity I would love to share with more people, but we have limited space on the trailer which will be shuttled to the take out point by our trip's host.
item.name: One way kayak paddle! Merrimack River from Merrimack, NH to Lowell, MA
